entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
